name: crayfishx-swap
author: crayfishx
summary: Type and provider for managing swap
description: Create and manage swap paging space sizes.  Currently AIX only.

properties.name: size
properties.doc: Size in MB specified as nM

parameters.name: device
parameters.doc: Device to create the swap on

providers.name: aix
providers.doc:
Manages swap sizes on AIX

Required binaries: `chps`.  Default for `operatingsystem` == `AIX`.
